availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Union County, Tennessee, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Hannah Wyrick. Father of Mary L. S. Wyrick Parker, George Wyrick, James S. Wyrick, Jacob Wyrick, and John V. Wyrick.. Farmer in Grainger County in 1840. Farmer in Union County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Sixth Manuscript Census of the United States (1840), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Grainger County, p.139.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Union County, District 1, p. 421.
"Jefferson Wyrick (1811-unknown)," Find A Grave, Memorial #44488801, accessed September 29, 2021, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/44488801/.
Tennessee Death Records, 1908-1958, Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, TN, Loudon County Death Certificates, File #344.
